article.title: SURVICE Engineering to Support U.S. Marine Network Centers
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: SURVICE Engineering Company, Dumfries, Virginia, is being awarded a nearly $12 million task order to provide technical support to the Marine Corps Regional Network Operation Support Centers, Marine Air Ground Task Force Information Technology Support Centers and the Marine Corps Base/Post/Station (garrison) network operations and support sites, and to provide planning, sustainment and transition support during migration of the Marine Corps information technology environment from a contractor-operated to a government-operated domain.Â The Marine Corps System Command, Quantico, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
